HomeSection.title: Card Drawing Simulation
HomeSection.description: The Card Drawing Simulation section is a virtual experience that simulates the process of randomly distributing a deck of 52 cards among a group of people, allowing users to observe and test the distribution process in real-time.

CardDrawingSimulation.title: Card Drawing Simulation
CardDrawingSimulation.description: To start the simulation, enter the number of people who will be receiving cards.

ErrorMessage.numberOnly: This field must be a number
ErrorMessage.positiveNumberOnly: Number of poeple must be greater than 0

ComingSoonSection.title: AI-powered Card Drawing Simulation
ComingSoonSection.description: Experience the thrill of card drawing with our upcoming AI-powered simulator. Perfect your skills and simulate drawing cards for any number of players with our advanced machine learning algorithms.

GameRules.title: Card Drawing Rules
GameRules.rule1: Shuffle the deck of 52 cards thoroughly.
GameRules.rule2: Determine the number of people who will be receiving cards (n).
GameRules.rule3: Divide the deck of cards into n equal parts.
GameRules.rule4: System will try to distribute each part of the deck equally among the n people, ensuring that each person receives the same number of cards.
GameRules.rule5: If there are any people left who have not received cards, that means (n) people exceeded 52.
